```{r packages, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(rnaturalearth)
library(rnaturalearthdata)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```


```{r}
world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")
ggplot(world, aes(fill = pop_est)) +
  geom_sf() +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "plasma", trans = "sqrt")
```
